headline: WDC Surges 129% in 6 Months: How Should Investors Play the Stock?
summary: Western Digital's shares have soared 128.8% in six months as AI demand, high-capacity drives and debt reduction fuel momentum near 52-week highs.

headline: Seagate Technology (STX): Rethinking Valuation After Analyst Sentiment Shifts and Strong Year-to-Date Gains
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings (STX): A Fresh Spotlight Amid Soaring Gains Seagate Technology Holdings (STX) is attracting more investor attention lately and for good reason. The company’s stock has surged 128% year-to-date, redefining how the market views this computer hardware giant. Fueling the conversation is a recent shift in analyst sentiment. Where prominent market-watchers once leaned toward rivals or alternative tech picks, momentum now appears to be favoring Seagate, thanks to robust...

headline: Strength Seen in Seagate (STX): Can Its 7.7% Jump Turn into More Strength?
summary: Seagate (STX) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock suggests that there could be more strength down the road.

headline: S&P Futures Tick Higher Ahead of FOMC Meeting and U.S. Retail Sales Data
summary: September S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESU25) are trending up +0.23% this morning as investors brace for the start of the Federal Reserve’s two-day policy meeting, where it is widely expected to cut interest rates, while also awaiting U.S. retail sales data.
